description: Core developer of [Settlus](https://settlus.org) blockchain, also developed backend for Overdare's [Creator Hub](https://create.overdare.com/).
Part of Project Migaloo: Web 3.0 Team, spin off to OVERDARE Inc.

Developed personalized analytics platform, and real-time data pipeline for PUBG LITE and [New State Mobile](https://newstate.pubg.com/ko). Led a team of 10 data analysts and improved the analytics ecosystem to support data-driven decision making.
